_header: To think it is a wonder thing
_description: ‘This werlde es tournede vp-so downe’ — four lines of a song

BLAdd31042.Transcription: To thynke it es a wondir thyngeOf this werldis MutabilyteeI ame Matede in my mosyngeOf the variaunce the whilke þat I now see
BLAdd31042.Attributed Title: A gud schorte song of this dete. This werlde es tournede vp so downne (f. 97v)
